Description: U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Iowa awarded EPA more than $1.6 million in penalties and more than $1.4 million in punitive damages for noncompliance with a cleanup order associated with the Dico, Inc. facility in Des Moines, Iowa.
Info Source: http://www2.epa.gov/enforcement/case-summary-superfund-penalties-and-punitive-damages-awarded-noncompliance-response
